crypto.name: Perfect Encryption
crypto.desc: I missed up with my perfect system. Can you figure out what I did wrong?.

crypto.name: Power Times
crypto.desc: The only way to survive is you have to be patient. nc 34.154.18.2 6952

crypto.name: Sign Hell
crypto.desc: A gate was opened to the hell. Can you find the way out? nc 34.154.18.2 6951

forensic.name: Baby I m a killer
forensic.desc: A hacker managed to install and deploy another kernel driver in the same machine from which we received the memory dump in the first two challenges, Could you find when it was first installed and its first key value? NOTE: you need to download this memdump, as it's entirely different from the one in the first two challenges.

forensic.name: Track a coin from your crypto O valley of plenty
We have a new contract for you
root of evil
forensic.desc: During our investigation in the memory dump from the first challenge, our investigator stumbled upon a signed malicious driver that wes deployed on the machine, could you get the address of the windows API functions, which the driver was using?

rev.name: Amber
rev.desc: Here we are, trapped in the amber of the moment.

rev.name: Free Flag
rev.desc: Are you a supper guesser or just a normal one ?
